sentences: Philip Anthony Bernard (born August 22, 1982) better known by his stage name Grafh, is an American rapper.
He has released a collection of mixtapes and an album, Autografh, which was released through EMI Records and Virgin Records.
He is currently an independent artist.
Grafh has also been supported by several well-known artists, including Drake, Trinidad James and Raekwon.
Shia LaBeouf praised on Grafh in a late-night interview with Carson Daly.
On February 26, 2014, Grafh released his mixtape "New York Dxpe" hosted by DJ Mr. FX
In 2016, Grafh collaborated with singerâ€“songwriter Melissa B. on the singles, "Creep" and "The Greatest".
